TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Make Graves Unescapable
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes graves from dead being able to escape, to not being able to.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Make Sarcophagi Unescapable
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes sarcophagi from dead being able to escape, to not being able to.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Make Stone Sarcophagi Unescapable
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Unlike the normal setting, this only prevents escape if the sarcophagus is made from stone materials.
